column6: Work-related ill health
column13: Exposure Management Process at Incitec Pivot is a strategic framework designed to identify, assess, and control potential risks associated with various workplace exposures. This process involves a comprehensive evaluation of chemical, physical, and ergonomic hazards to determine the level of risk to employees. By implementing robust exposure management protocols, Incitec Pivot aims to proactively mitigate risks and ensure the health and safety of its workforce.
column20: Exposure Management Process, regularly reviewed, regulatory requirement
